spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct and adjacency is maintained. However, the door to the 'Activity' area is missing. The proportions of the hallway/lobby leading to the bedrooms are slightly exaggerated compared to the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity. No text or UI elements present. Roof is correctly removed, and the model is floating on a dark background as required.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is well-placed and scaled, but there is a hallucination of a TV and stand in the Activity room not shown in the plan. Robe/closet doors are rendered as standard doors rather than block outlines.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly, flat shading, clean isometric camera angle, and no photorealistic textures.

detected_errors.description: Missing entry door transition from the staircase landing to the Activity room.
Hallucinated TV and media console in the Activity room that was not present in the 2D plan.
The Robe (wardrobe) sections are interpreted as walk-in rooms with standard doors rather than built-in closets.
